forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain late. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 61F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
